attributes.action: Mandatory 10years in prison for local authorities & organisations  abusing taxpayers money
attributes.additional_details: Millions of pounds of hard earned taxpayers money is wasted or as I like too put it " willingly and knowingly abused " every month in this country by all government departments from the very top to the very bottom, it's about time that everybody in every department or organisation that is supported by the money provided by the British Taxpayer is held totally responsible and accountable for any misdemeanours that result in theft from the British Taxpayer, no matter how big or how small the theft is a mandatory 10 year jail term should be imposed for all those that are found to be guilty of this offence.
